title: Celsius Exec Pleads Guilty, Agrees to Cooperate in Case Against CEO
description: Former chief revenue officer Roni Cohen-Pavon reached an agreement with the U.S. Attorney’s office along with his guilty plea.

title: Polygon 2.0 Roadmap: MATIC Token Migration Scheduled For Q4
description: The Polygon network has published its roadmap for the upcoming Polygon 2.0, which includes migration from MATIC to POL token and the staking layer deployment.

title: The future of the crypto world: decentralized Stablecoins
description: The rapid growth of the cryptocurrency market has given rise to a plethora of coins and tokens, but it’s the stablecoins that are capturing significant attention. title: Top 10 Football Managers of All Time: AI-Generated Ranking Revealed
description: In the world of football, the debate over the greatest managers of all time is never-ending. title: Metaverse land sales update a year-low at $4.1m

title: Remitano allegedly hacked over $2.7 million
description: Remitano, a Seychelles-based cryptocurrency exchange platform, experienced suspicious transactions on Sept. 14. title: Binance US loses head of legal and chief risk officer

title: Bitcoin Primed To Surge Over 70% in 2015-Style Price Jump, Says Michaël van de Poppe – Here’s the Timeline
description:
